data.title: Comscore to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences
data.meta_description:
Comscore today announced that it will participate in the upcoming investor conferences. 

Executive Vice Chairman and President Bill Livek will present at the ninth annual Gabelli Movie and Entertainment Conference on Thursday, June 8 in New York City.

Executive Vice Chairman and President Bill Livek and Chief Financial Officer David Chemerow will present at the fourth annual Bernstein Future of Media Summit on Wednesday, June 28 at Hyatt Centric Times Square hotel in New York City.
data.text:
RESTON, VA, June 1, 2017 â€“ Comscore today announced that it will participate in the upcoming investor conferences.

Executive Vice Chairman and President Bill Livek will present at the ninth annual Gabelli Movie and Entertainment Conference on Thursday, June 8 in New York City.

Executive Vice Chairman and President Bill Livek and Chief Financial Officer David Chemerow will present at the fourth annual Bernstein Future of Media Summit on Wednesday, June 28 at Hyatt Centric Times Square hotel in New York City.
